transArray.content: It was my first time to visit this store. I got off Line 6 at Haidian Wuluju Station, walked out from Exit A, crossed the overpass and walked south. It is very convenient to travel. There is also a bus stop at the door. It is very good for traveling with children.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your satisfaction is our greatest encouragement and support. The welcome gifts carefully prepared by the hotel for you carry our most sincere greetings and expectations for you. We are committed to providing every guest with meticulous, thoughtful, warm and considerate services. We strive to make every guest happy to become a repeat customer. The hotel is located at the 2nd east gate of Badili Automobile Park on the West Fourth Ring Auxiliary Road. Take Metro Line 6 and exit from Haidian 5th Road Ju Station. You can walk directly to the hotel in 3-5 minutes. Public transportation is available in all directions, making it convenient for you to travel. The best choice for traveling, all the hotel staff look forward to meeting you every time, and wish you a happy summer! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
